name: Definitive Runner
description:
Please keep in mind that this is a begginer's project. Some years ago I made a very similar game using a youtube tutorial, but I was only copying all I was seeing on the video, so I really didn't learn anything. However, I have just finished a beginner's unity online course, so I decided to do a remake of that game with the knowlege that I just gained. This is the background story of this game.

Gameplay info: You gain points by getting stars. There are five different stars, from five pointed to nine pointed, and their values go from 20 to 100 with a difference of 20 between them. The highscore and the volumes of the music and the sounds are saved when you exit the game. Thanks for playing and enjoy!
